name: Prismic Reflections
tagline: Digital Experiences to Empower The User
description:
Prismic Reflections®  is an award-winning experience design studio, helping product & service companies to craft Human-Centric Design Experiences to create an impact by strategic design.
Highlights
More than 14 years of experience in multidisciplinary design practices 
Our goal is to EMPOWER USERS by creating the best digital experiences.
Believe in Useful, Meaningful, Communicative & Simple design that solves the problem.
Close knit team works with selected & limited projects at a time.
Client base spread across the globe
Our Services
User Experience Design 
Brand Identity Design 
Design Consulting 
Front - End Development
READ MORE...
